title: Fundamentals
text: Learn the basics of the Python programming language.
author: keshavsaharia

section.title: Values
section.text: A value is a unit of information, like numbers and text.

section.title: Math Operators
section.text: Math operators are symbols that combine two values into a single one.

section.title: Variables
section.text: A variable is a named container for storing a value.

section.title: Functions
section.text: A function is an action the computer knows how to perform.

section.title: Function call
section.text: A function call instructs the computer to perform a certain function.

section.title: Return Values
section.text: A function call can return a new value.

section.title: Data Types
section.text: Every value has a data type, which describes how it can be combined with other values.

section.title: Booleans
section.text: A boolean value is either true or false.

section.title: Logic Operators
section.text: A logic operator combines boolean values.
